questions.quote: That you had ice cream all over your face. They were talking about how funny you looked.
She put them in her pocketbook. I guess she took them with her.
Umm, I'm not actually going straight to home, I have to first stop at the eh...circus, you know with all the...clowns.
Oh, nothing, I just stopped by to chat, you know, shoot the breeze.
Now, I'm aware that my own physical dimensions are perhaps a little short of perfection.
I made a conscious effort not to look. There's certain information I just don't want to have.
I'd accuse you of cheating, but I don't know where you'd hide the tiles.
Yeah. Dandruff, kasha, mothballs, cheap carpeting. It's pot pourri, really.
In your laundry the whole time? I told you not to mix in our guys. What did we figure the damage on that machine would be?
I'm sorry I didn't get any sleep you kept kicking me in the face.
